activities:
Return Path, Inc. (including its subsidiaries, “Return Path”) at times acts as both a Data Processor and Data Controllers on behalf of its clients and subsidiaries.

If Return Path receives personal information from its subsidiaries or clients, Return Path processes personal information on behalf of its clients only as specified by explicit instructions and agreements between Return Path and our clients. Return Path will not transfer or disclose personal data to any third party, except as explicitly requested by the Data Controller and only for the purposes for which it was intended or otherwise stated in the applicable privacy policy for such services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms:
Return Path is a participant in TRUSTE Safe Harbor Program. If you believe Return
Path has not satisfactorily addressed your data privacy concerns, you may contact
TRUSTe here: https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request
